content: a random act of kindness 1 ©2018 natalie raedwulf all rights reserved in purchasing this pattern you agree to print and use this pattern only for your personal non-commercial use you may not distribute or sell electronic or paper copies of this pattern without permission from nat raedwulf for inquiries please email wolfandfaunknits@gmail com a random act of kindness is a quick knit with big heart designed to inspire kindness to one another it is a textured triangular scarf knit on a bias in dk weight yarn making it a fast knit perfect for gift knitting or as an act of kindness to yourself this is a functional yet versatile knit perfect as an accessory to dress up an outfit or as a garment to keep one warm during cooler weather as with its sister-shawl pay it forward a random act of kindness was created to spread sweetness it is a pay-what-you-can pattern with part of the proceeds going toward helping others details yarn approximately 393 meters/430 yards of dk weight yarn specific yarn used in sample 2 skeins of barnyard knits yak silk dk in natural needles 4 5 mm / us 7 circular needles notions tapestry needle for weaving in ends blocking tools gauge stockinette stitch 15 sts x 36 row = 10 cm/ 4 garment size 38 cm/15 deep with a 241 cm/95 wingspan notes - gauge is not essential for this item though the wool requirements may change if you go up or down in needle size and / or yarn weight - for an alternative bind off to suit style you can use a stretchy bobble for a straight edge without picots abbreviations bobble - bind off co - cast on p - purl k - knit p2tog - purl two together rs - right k2tog - knit two together side kf&b - knit through the front and st/sts - stitch/es back of the stitch ws - wrong side ktbl -
